xml:
Avonex<tm tmtype="reg"/> vial Indications and dose

For relapsing, remitting multiple sclerosis (characterised by at least two attacks of neurological dysfunction over the previous 2 or 3 years, followed by complete or incomplete recovery) who are able to walk unaided

For a single demyelinating event with an active inflammatory process (if severe enough to require intravenous corticosteroid and patient at high risk of developing multiple sclerosis)

By intramuscular injection

  • Adult

    (consult product literature).

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
